mapper.insert: INSERT INTO NAMECARD( NCSEQ, USERID, NCCHECK, NCNAME, NCEMAIL, NCMOBILE, NCPHONE, NCFAX, NCCOMPANY, NCDEPARTMENT, NCTITLE, NCWEBSITE, NCADDRESS, NAMECARDURL ) VALUES( NCSEQ.NEXTVAL, #{userID}, #{ncCheck}, #{ncName}, #{ncEmail}, #{ncMobile, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ncPhone, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ncFax, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ncCompany, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ncDepartment, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ncTitle, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ncWebsite, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ncAddress, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{nameCardUrl, jdbcType=VARCHAR} )
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM NAMECARD WHERE NCEMAIL = #{ncEmail} AND USERID = #{userID}

SELECT COUNT(NCSEQ) from NAMECARD
WHERE NCNAME LIKE '%' || #{searchText} || '%'
WHERE NCEMAIL LIKE '%' || #{searchText} || '%'
WHERE NCCOMPANY LIKE '%' || #{searchText} || '%'

SELECT USERID, NCCHECK, NCNAME, NCEMAIL, NCMOBILE, NCPHONE, NCFAX, NCCOMPANY, NCDEPARTMENT, NCTITLE, NCWEBSITE, NCADDRESS, NAMECARDURL FROM NAMECARD
WHERE NCNAME LIKE '%' || #{searchText} || '%'
WHERE NCEMAIL LIKE '%' || #{searchText} || '%'
WHERE NCCOMPANY LIKE '%' || #{searchText} || '%'
ORDER BY NCSEQ DESC
